title: Status of women in the 1920s - change

content.prompt: Which of the following is a major change in the status of women that occurred in the 1920s?

choices.label: They began to vote in national elections.
They gained the right to initiate divorce proceedings.
They began to serve in the armed forces.
They were elected to federal office in large numbers.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
